trans-unit.source: When Rukh Egg dies, create a 4/4 red Bird creature token with flying at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: When Rukh Egg dies, create a 4/4 red Bird creature token with flying at the beginning of the next end step.

trans-unit.source: Called "stonefeathers" by many lowlanders, rukhs are thought to descend from a phoenix that sacrificed its flame for a body of stone.
trans-unit.target: Called "stonefeathers" by many lowlanders, rukhs are thought to descend from a phoenix that sacrificed its flame for a body of stone.
